Package com.openclassrooms.paymybuddy.service

Interface UserService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserServiceImpl
    @Service
public interface UserService
    Service Interface for managing users.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getAll

        org.springframework.data.domain.Page<UserDto> getAll​(org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
        Get a page of the list of all users in the form of DTO.
        Parameters:
        pageable - of the requested page
        Returns:
        Page of UserDto

      • getById

        UserDto getById​(int id)
         throws ResourceNotFoundException
        Get a user DTO by id.
        Parameters:
        id - of user
        Returns:
        UserDto
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - if user not found

      • register

        UserDto register​(UserDto user)
          throws ResourceAlreadyExistsException
        Handle user registration from the data provide in the form of DTO with firstname, lastname, email and password. Password will be encoded and email will be checked to ensure email uniqueness. The new user is saved in the database.
        Parameters:
        user - to register
        Returns:
        UserDto of the registered user
        Throws:
        ResourceAlreadyExistsException - if email already exists

      • update

        UserDto update​(UserDto user)
        throws ResourceNotFoundException,
               ResourceAlreadyExistsException
        Handle user update from the data provide in the form of DTO. If email has benn changed, it will be checked. If password field is left blank or null it won't be updated, else the new password will be encoded and the user updated in the database.
        Parameters:
        user - update
        Returns:
        UserDto of the updated user
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - if user not found
        ResourceAlreadyExistsException - if email already exists

      • setAccountEnabling

        void setAccountEnabling​(int id,
                        boolean enable)
                 throws ResourceNotFoundException
        Set user enabling to authenticate.
        Parameters:
        id - of the user
        enable - to update
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - if user not found

      • deleteById

        void deleteById​(int id)
         throws ResourceNotFoundException,
                ForbiddenOperationException
        Delete a user by checking if wallet amount is null and clearing connections with other users. All onUserDeletion() method of observer service will be called before deleting the user from the database.
        Parameters:
        id - of the user
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - if user not found
        ForbiddenOperationException - if user wallet isn't empty

      • retrieveEntity

        User retrieveEntity​(int id)
             throws ResourceNotFoundException
        Return a User entity if it exists by id.
        Parameters:
        id - of the user
        Returns:
        User
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - if user not found

      • retrieveEntity

        Return a User entity if it exists by email.
        Parameters:
        email - of the user
        Returns:
        User
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - if user not found

      • saveEntity

        User saveEntity​(User user)
         throws ResourceNotFoundException
        Persist a user in the database if it already exists.
        Parameters:
        user - to persist
        Returns:
        User
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - if user not exists
